body: Who can i talk to about I got ban when I tried to talk to an admin that he was no't hacking. that made me wery angre becaose i used a loot of time on THE WALLS

title: Got ban for no reason !!

replies.body:
Ok so, you were caught for ban evasion.
My eyes hurt from looking at that poor spelling.
Anyways, I think you can make an appeal, but it has to be a good one!

replies.body: <u></u>Your evasion was before the policy, so I think you can still be appealed.

replies.body:
Please make an appeal here https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50.
Remember to follow the format.
Good luck with your appeal :D.
